node.excerpt: Recently I got tasked with exporting a list of all users in a clients Sitecore installation. My immidiate though was to use Sitecoreâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Get an exportable list of users in Sitecore using Sitecore Powershell
frontmatter.description: Here I will show how to get a list of users in Sitecore which can be exported to an Excel or CSV file.
